DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Anecortave Acetate is effective for lowering intraocular pressure caused by open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Dose Study With a Treatment for Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Patients at least 18 years old with a clinical diagnosis of OpenAngle Glaucoma for at least 6 months and currently treated with a monotherapy hypotensive medication Prior angle surgery in the study eye, severe visual field loss in either eye, and any other form of glaucoma besides openangle glaucoma
